itunes:title: Authors We've Been Meaning to Read & Finally Did!
title: Authors We've Been Meaning to Read & Finally Did!
description:
In Episode 50 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share a few books by authors they've been meaning to read. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about authors, book signings, and festivals

**If you enjoy our podcast, please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We'd love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus episodes including Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, Even More Best of the Year, Backlist Book Club, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, Mood Reader Happy Hour, an engaging private Facebook group & our BRAND NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons, and more- all for just $5 a month!

Loving Lately
4:53 Author Events (T)
7:16 Clinique Chubby Stick Eye Shadow Tint (R)
9:14 Thrive's Brilliant Eye Brightener

Latest Reads
